title: DeFi Platform Earning Yield by Shorting Ether Attracts $300M on First Day
description: Ethena offers a 27% annualized reward to holders of its USDe stablecoins, a yield mostly generated by shorting ether futures.

title: Bitwise Bitcoin ETF approved investment option for $30 billion advisor network
description:
Bitwise Bitcoin ETF Trust (BITB) was recently approved as an investment option for a $30 billion network of Registered Investment Advisors (RIAs). Bitwise CEO Hunter Horsley revealed this development via social media platform X (formerly Twitter) on Feb. 19, noting that advisors within the network are now authorized to allocate funds with BITB, typically ranging […]

title: How Cardano’s Midnight Could Safeguard Users from Romance Bot Risks
description: Cardano, under the guidance of founder Charles Hoskinson, has unveiled Midnight, a revolutionary sidechain aimed at elevating privacy standards in the digital sphere.  This groundbreaking initiative addresses mounting concerns surrounding data protection amidst the proliferation of romantic chatbots and the attendant privacy risks. Exploring Cardano Midnight’s core features and applications Midnight emerges as a beacon […]

title: Microsoft Announces $2.1 Billion Investment in AI and Cloud Infrastructure in Spain
description: Microsoft, the US-based technology giant, has unveiled its plans to bolster its artificial intelligence (AI) and cloud infrastructure in Spain with a substantial investment of $2.1 billion (€1.9 billion) over the next two years.  This initiative marks a significant step beyond establishing data centers, emphasizing the company’s dedication to fostering the digital transformation and development […]

title: Experts Say Bitcoin Takes Backseat in Africa Crypto Adoption, with USDT Ruling
description:

title: Trader Says DeFi and Another Crypto Sector Are Going To Significantly Outperform, Updates Outlook on Bitcoin
description:
